forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun generously shines down, casting a bright light across the familiar cityscape. A refreshing breeze flows in from the west at a steady pace, drawing the cool air from the ocean into the urban core. As the temperature hovers around the low sixties, a slight chill fills the air, hinting at the transition into evening when the mercury will dip further. The forecast does not betray any fog gracing the immediate vicinity, though hints of the iconic marine layer linger along the peripheries, softening the edges where land meets sea.

As the sun readies its descent, the evening promises a partly cloudy sky, inviting those who appreciate the cooler, hushed hours to step outside. This day calls for layers — a light jacket will serve well to embrace both the warmth of the sun and the coolness that settles in as twilight approaches. Perhaps a leisurely walk along one of the quieter streets, or enjoying a warm drink in an outdoor café would round out the experience beautifully. The charm of the city comes alive in these moments, wrapping the day in a gentle embrace of creativity and contemplation.
